content:
Tips> Tips # 记录一些常用的东西和一些解决的报错问题
version `CXXABI_1.3.9’ not found> version `CXXABI_1.3.9’ not found # 这个问题产生的原因我并不清楚，可能是由于重装conda导致的，通过 这里找到解决方法：
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/your/path/to/conda/env/lib
通过端口转发远程链接jupyter lab> 通过端口转发远程链接jupyter lab # 首先是生成configure，然后对其中的特定参数进行修改
jupyter-lab --generate-config #生成configure #下面在python中生成密码 from notebook.auth import passwd passwd() # 123456，拷贝获得的token #============= #修改config中的参数 c.ServerApp.allow_remote_access = True c.ServerApp.ip = '*' c.ServerApp.password = 'token' 在HPC的任务节点上启动交互式启动任务
qsub -I -q pub_gpu -l nodes=1:ppn=1 #会返回节点名称 [wanggsh@pub-gpu101 ~ 14:29:23],其中pub-gpu101很重要 #进入节点后运行jupyterlab conda activate jupyterlab jupyter lab --port=8888 --no-browser 通过ssh解析来进行端口的转发
ssh -N -f -L localhost:8888:[节点名称]:8888 wanggsh@10.15.22.191 -p 22112 #输入密码登陆 #在浏览器中通过http://localhost:8888即可完成链接 关闭和复用，需要接触端口的占用·
lsof -i tcp:8888 kill -9 PID 参考： 1， 2
summary:
Tips> Tips # 记录一些常用的东西和一些解决的报错问题
version `CXXABI_1.3.9’ not found> version `CXXABI_1.3.9’ not found # 这个问题产生的原因我并不清楚，可能是由于重装conda导致的，通过 这里找到解决方法：
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/your/path/to/conda/env/lib
通过端口转发远程链接jupyter lab> 通过端口转发远程链接jupyter lab # 首先是生成configure，然后对其中的特定参数进行修改
jupyter-lab --generate-config #生成configure #下面在python中生成密码 from notebook.auth import passwd passwd() # 123456，拷贝获得的token #============= #修改config中的参数 c.
title: Knowledage tips

content:
R Markdown> R Markdown # This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com.
You can embed an R code chunk like this:
summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.579 3.932 Including Plots> Including Plots # You can also embed plots. See Figure 1 for example:
par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'), col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'), init.angle = -50, border = NA ) Figure 1: A fancy pie chart.
summary: R Markdown> R Markdown # This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
title: Hello R Markdown
